entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who flew the car and is being referred to by Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'Come on, Harry' and is also referring to Harry.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is described as marching across the yard, scattering chickens, and is referred to by her sons.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as saying 'Ah' in response to Mrs Weasley's arrival.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as saying 'Oh dear' and also trying to talk his way out of trouble with his mother.

entities.name: sabre-toothed tiger
entities.description: The comparison between Mrs Weasley and a sabre-toothed tiger is used to describe her appearance.

relationships.description: Ron is associated with Harry as they are both involved in the flying of the car.
Mrs Weasley is referred to as Fred's mother.
Mrs Weasley is also referred to as George's mother.
Fred and Harry are acquaintances, as they both seem to be aware of the flying incident.
George is also an acquaintance of Harry's.
